name: Showgo.tv
overview:
ShowGo.tv allows you to connect to artists and fans during shows and sound checks, and find out everything you need to know about hot venues and musicians.

ShowGo.tv thinks that everyone in the world should have easy and affordable access 24/7 to the world’s best live music. Club-hop on your iPad. Have live music as background music in your living room with loved ones and party guests. Listen to shows from Milan, London, San Francisco, Rio in your car.

For now, we are streaming from London, Sao Paulo, Milan, and several U.S. cities, premier clubs with both big name artists and up and coming bands.

ShowGo.tv is the brainchild of a team of industry professionals with a collective two centuries of experience building successful brands and companies in the media, music and technology spaces. We love live music, we love streaming video and we love creating new media experiences.
